inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, not anaplastic thyroid carcinoma.

inclusion.criterion: brain metastases stable for at least six weeks post-radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of radiation therapy, but no mention of brain metastases stability.

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of cancer, but no mention of life expectancy

inclusion.criterion: Hematologic: ANC 1,500 mm3, hemoglobin 8.0 g/dl, platelets 100,000/mm3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal serum calcium level within normal limits for the institution documented within 14 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic function as defined by a serum bilirubin 1.5 x the institutional upper limit of normal (ULN), and ALT and AST <2.5 x ULN, obtained within 14 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a serum creatinine less than 1.5 x the institutional upper limits of normal (adjusted for age) within 14 days of registration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test at baseline, prior to receiving any study drug.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign an informed consent prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Anaplastic thyroid cancer that does not overexpress PDGF receptors or c-Abl by immunohistochemistry
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, not anaplastic thyroid carcinoma.

exclusion.criterion: Any medical or psychiatric illness which, in the opinion of the principal investigator, would compromise the patient's ability to tolerate this treatment regimen.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No concurrent radiotherapy (to the primary tumor) or chemotherapy may be given to the patient during the administration of the study drug.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of radiation therapy and chemotherapy, but no mention of current treatment

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or lactating women, women of childbearing potential with either a positive pregnancy test (PPT) at baseline, or sexually active females not using reliable contraceptive methods while on study and for at least six months after chemotherapy.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Sexually active males not using reliable contraceptive methods while on the study and for at least six months after chemotherapy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with malabsorption syndromes will be excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, not anaplastic thyroid carcinoma. No information is available on Karnofsky performance status, hematologic parameters, serum calcium level, hepatic function, or serum creatinine.
